description: Your legs work hard out there. Give them the coverage and warmth of these insulated trail pants. The exterior blocks out rain and stains, while the thermal-reflective interior helps retain heat. Made with comfort stretch fabric, they're cut to let you move freely.
name: Columbia Sportswear Santee Crest II Insulated Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 40g Omni-Heat™ Insulation 100% recycled polyester, 93% Polyester, 7% Elastane
